thread.title: Minneapolis sues Ryan, subcontractors over water main break
thread.title_full: Minneapolis sues Ryan, subcontractors over water main break

author: Brian Johnson
title: Minneapolis sues Ryan, subcontractors over water main break
text:
Home / News / Construction & Development / Minneapolis sues Ryan, subcontractors over water main break A ruptured water main flooded downtown Minneapolis streets in January 2013 with 14 million gallons of water. The incident happened in connection with the $71 million 222 Hennepin apartment project under construction at the time (File photo: Bill Klotz) Minneapolis sues Ryan, subcontractors over water main break By: Brian Johnson July 15, 2015 4:01 pm 0 The city is seeking “less than $300,000” in damages from Ryan Cos. US Inc. and two subcontractors over a punctured water main that flooded downtown Minneapolis with 14 million gallons of water in early 2013. User Name/E-mail: Password:
